title: HoP 391 - Everything is Mine and Nothing - Lipsius and the Revival of Stoicism
itunes:title: HoP 391 - Everything is Mine and Nothing - Lipsius and the Revival of Stoicism
description: Justus Lipsius draws on Seneca and other Stoics to counsel peace of mind in the face of political chaos, but also writes a work on how such chaos can be avoided.
content:encoded: Justus Lipsius draws on Seneca and other Stoics to counsel peace of mind in the face of political chaos, but also writes a work on how such chaos can be avoided.
itunes:subtitle: Justus Lipsius draws on Seneca and other Stoics to counsel peace of mind in the face of political chaos, but also writes a work on how such chaos can be avoided.
itunes:summary: Justus Lipsius draws on Seneca and other Stoics to counsel peace of mind in the face of political chaos, but also writes a work on how such chaos can be avoided.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson
